UN Women's Rights Convention Revoked Recently
UN Women's Rights Convention Ratified Recently
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 34/180, The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women.
Ratify The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women.

Withdraw from The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 34/180, The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.
UN Women's Rights Convention Fails Vote
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 34/180, The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Women's Rights Convention Passes Vote
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 34/180, The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 34/180, The Convention on the Elimination of all Forms of Discrimination against Women, at the UN General Assembly.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
We have ratified the UN Women's Rights Convention.
Withdrawal from the Women's Rights Convention
We have withdrawn from the UN Women's Rights Convention.
